title: Joe Burrow is fine with being a Bengal, More NFL Combine Updates (Football 2/26)
description:
Ryan Wilson is joined by Brady Quinn, Pete Prisco and Jamey Eisenberg to discuss the latest happenings from the NFL Combine in Indianapolis. The guys discuss early takeaways including Joe Burrow's comments to the media expressing no hesitation in getting pick by and playing for the Cincinnati Bengals (7:15). Ryan, Brady, Pete and Jamey also react to developments with Tua Tagovailoa's health (21:00) and the other top quarterback prospects at the combine (25:30), focusing on Jordan Love, Justin Herbert and Jacob Eason.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @ryanwilsoncbs, @Brady_Quinn, and @jameyeisnberg
